ExpressionSetDefinitionContextDefinition.name: ExpressionSetDefinitionContextDefinition
ExpressionSetDefinitionContextDefinition.description: Represents a relationship between an expression set definition and a context definition. This object is available in API version 58.0 and later.

ContextDefinitionApiName.description: API name of the context definition.

ExecutableContextDefinition.description: Developer name of the file-based context definition.

ExpressionSetApiName.description: API name of the expression set.

ExpressionSetDefinitionId.description: ID of the expression set definition.
